text:
just discovered ReplMaker.jl (<https://github.com/MasonProtter/ReplMaker.jl>). It's amazing that it makes it possible to get a whole new (useful) repl mode in one line of code! (thanks, <@U8D9768Q6> and contributors) e.g.
```julia> using ReplMaker

julia> initrepl(apropos; prompt_text="search> ", prompt_color=:magenta, start_key=')', mode_name="search_mode")
REPL mode search_mode initialized. Press ) to enter and backspace to exit.
"Prompt(\"search> \",...)"

search> drop
Base.dropdims
Base.Iterators.takewhile
Base.Iterators.drop
Base.Iterators.dropwhile
Base.Filesystem.joinpath
SparseArrays.dropzeros!
SparseArrays.sparse
SparseArrays.dropzeros
SparseArrays.dropstored!
SparseArrays.droptol!```
